open_drawdown_case.description: open drawdown case a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only open drawdown case a drawdown case A if it is not the case that the drawdown for A is open and it is not the case that the drawdown for A is completed and it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown
effects: Once I open drawdown case a drawdown case A, it is the case that the drawdown for A is open

select_request_channel.description: select a request channel B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only select a request channel B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open
I can only select a request channel B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown
effects: Once I select a request channel B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that B is selected for case A

select_facility_document.description: select a facility document B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only select a facility document B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open
I can only select a facility document B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown
effects: Once I select a facility document B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that the facility B is selected for case A

verify_borrowing_base_certificate.description: verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown-case A using a document B
preconditions: I can only verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown-case A using a document B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a required document for A and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is borrowing the base certificate
I can only verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown-case A using a document B if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown-case A using a document B, it is the case that B is verified and A has a verified borrowing base

verify_compliance_certificate.description: verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a required document for A and B is a document for case A and B has been received and the document B is a compliance certificate
I can only verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate B for a drawdown case A, it is the case that B is verified and A has a verified compliance certificate

verify_covenant_compliance_statement.description: verify covenant compliance statement a covenant_compliance_statement B for a drawdown_case A
preconditions: I can only verify covenant compliance statement a covenant_compliance_statement B for a drawdown_case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a required document for A and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is a covenant compliance statement
I can only verify covenant compliance statement a covenant_compliance_statement B for a drawdown_case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify covenant compliance statement a covenant_compliance_statement B for a drawdown_case A, it is the case that B is verified and the covenant statement for A is verified

verify_use_of_proceeds_statement.description: verify use of proceeds statement a document B for a drawdown_case A
preconditions: I can only verify use of proceeds statement a document B for a drawdown_case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a required document for A and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is a use of proceeds statement
I can only verify use of proceeds statement a document B for a drawdown_case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify use of proceeds statement a document B for a drawdown_case A, it is the case that B is verified and the use of proceeds for A has been verified

verify_fee_calculation_sheet.description: verify fee calculation sheet a drawdown case A a drawdown document B
preconditions: I can only verify fee calculation sheet a drawdown case A a drawdown document B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a required document for A and B is a document for case A and B has been received and B is a fee calculation sheet
I can only verify fee calculation sheet a drawdown case A a drawdown document B if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is verified
effects: Once I verify fee calculation sheet a drawdown case A a drawdown document B, it is the case that B is verified

record_two_officer_signoff.description: record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D
preconditions: I can only record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a document for case A and B is a fee calculation sheet and B is verified and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and C has full clearance and D has full clearance

I can only record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that C is equal to D
effects: Once I record two officer signoff a drawdown case A a drawdown document B a bank drawdown officer C a bank drawdown officer D, it is the case that a two-officer signoff is recorded for A

verify_person_authorization_record.description: verify an authorization_kyc_record C for a participant_person B in a drawdown_case A
preconditions: I can only verify an authorization_kyc_record C for a participant_person B in a drawdown_case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and C is a required document for A and C is a document for B and C has been received and C is an authorization kyc record
I can only verify an authorization_kyc_record C for a participant_person B in a drawdown_case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that C is verified
effects: Once I verify an authorization_kyc_record C for a participant_person B in a drawdown_case A, it is the case that C is verified and B has their authorization documents verified

verify_person_contact_details.description: verify person contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only verify person contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B has their authorization documents verified and B is in the required set
I can only verify person contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B's contact is verified
effects: Once I verify person contact details for a participant person B in a drawdown case A, it is the case that B's contact is verified

run_full_person_screening.description: run full person screening for a participant person B on a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only run full person screening for a participant person B on a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is linked to the case A and B has their authorization documents verified and B's contact is verified
I can only run full person screening for a participant person B on a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B has full clearance
effects: Once I run full person screening for a participant person B on a drawdown case A, it is the case that sanctions have been checked for B and B has been pep checked and B has full clearance

run_sanctions_screening_only.description: run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B
preconditions: I can only run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is linked to the case A and B has their authorization documents verified
I can only run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that sanctions have been checked for B
effects: Once I run sanctions screening only a drawdown case A a participant person B, it is the case that sanctions have been checked for B

run_pep_screening_only.description: run pep screening only for a participant person B on a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only run pep screening only for a participant person B on a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is linked to the case A and B has their authorization documents verified
I can only run pep screening only for a participant person B on a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B has been pep checked
effects: Once I run pep screening only for a participant person B on a drawdown case A, it is the case that B has been pep checked

complete_basic_drawdown_checks.description: complete basic drawdown checks for a case A
preconditions: I can only complete basic drawdown checks for a case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A has a verified borrowing base
I can only complete basic drawdown checks for a case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that basic drawdown checks are complete for A
effects: Once I complete basic drawdown checks for a case A, it is the case that availability for A has been calculated and limit headroom is confirmed for A and basic drawdown checks are complete for A

enable_fast_track.description: enable fast track for a drawdown-case A
preconditions: I can only enable fast track for a drawdown-case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A has a verified borrowing base
I can only enable fast track for a drawdown-case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A has fast track enabled
effects: Once I enable fast track for a drawdown-case A, it is the case that A has fast track enabled

compile_drawdown_package.description: compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J
preconditions: I can only compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A has a verified borrowing base and the covenant statement for A is verified and A has a verified compliance certificate and the use of proceeds for A has been verified and F is a document for case A and F is borrowing the base certificate and F is verified and G is a document for case A and G is a covenant compliance statement and G is verified and H is a document for case A and the document H is a compliance certificate and H is verified and I is a document for case A and I is a use of proceeds statement and I is verified and J is a document for case A and J is a fee calculation sheet and J is verified and B is the required person for A and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and E is the required person for A and B has full clearance and C has full clearance and D has full clearance and E has full clearance and basic drawdown checks are complete for A

I can only compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that the drawdown package for A is compiled and it is not the case that B is equal to C and it is not the case that D is equal to E
effects: Once I compile drawdown package a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a drawdown document F a drawdown document G a drawdown document H a drawdown document I a drawdown document J, it is the case that the drawdown package for A is compiled

approve_drawdown_package_four_eyes.description: approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E
preconditions: I can only approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the drawdown package for A is compiled and a two-officer signoff is recorded for A and B is the required person for A and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and E is the required person for A and B has full clearance and C has full clearance and D has full clearance and E has full clearance

I can only approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A is approved by credit operations and it is not the case that B is equal to C and it is not the case that D is equal to E
effects: Once I approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E, it is the case that A is approved by credit operations and A is approved for risk

approve_drawdown_package_fast_track.description: approve fast-track drawdown package for a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only approve fast-track drawdown package for a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A has fast track enabled and A has a verified borrowing base and the covenant statement for A is verified
I can only approve fast-track drawdown package for a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A is approved by credit operations
effects: Once I approve fast-track drawdown package for a drawdown case A, it is the case that A is approved by credit operations and A is auto approved

authorize_packet_creation.description: authorize packet creation for a drawdown-case A
preconditions: I can only authorize packet creation for a drawdown-case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A is approved by credit operations

I can only authorize packet creation for a drawdown-case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A has a compliance hold flag and it is not the case that A has a suspicious payment flag and it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown and it is not the case that A is authorized for packet creation
effects: Once I authorize packet creation for a drawdown-case A, it is the case that A is authorized for packet creation

raise_compliance_hold.description: raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A
preconditions: I can only raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open
I can only raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A has a compliance hold flag
effects: Once I raise compliance hold on a drawdown case A, it is the case that A has a compliance hold flag

validate_facility_document.description: validate a facility document B for a case A
preconditions: I can only validate a facility document B for a case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the facility B is eligible for the case A and A is authorized for packet creation
I can only validate a facility document B for a case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is a validated facility document
effects: Once I validate a facility document B for a case A, it is the case that B is a validated facility document

create_drawdown_packet.description: create drawdown packet a drawdown_packet B for a drawdown_case A with signature slots a signature_slot C and a signature_slot D
preconditions: I can only create drawdown packet a drawdown_packet B for a drawdown_case A with signature slots a signature_slot C and a signature_slot D if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A is authorized for packet creation

I can only create drawdown packet a drawdown_packet B for a drawdown_case A with signature slots a signature_slot C and a signature_slot D if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B has been created and it is not the case that C is equal to D
effects: Once I create drawdown packet a drawdown_packet B for a drawdown_case A with signature slots a signature_slot C and a signature_slot D, it is the case that B has been created and B is a packet for case A and B has signature slot C and B has signature slot D

attach_facility_document_to_packet.description: attach facility document a facility_document C to packet a drawdown_packet B for case a drawdown_case A
preconditions: I can only attach facility document a facility_document C to packet a drawdown_packet B for case a drawdown_case A if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for case A and B has been created and C is a validated facility document

I can only attach facility document a facility_document C to packet a drawdown_packet B for case a drawdown_case A if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is finalized and it is not the case that B is attached to the facility document C
effects: Once I attach facility document a facility_document C to packet a drawdown_packet B for case a drawdown_case A, it is the case that B is attached to the facility document C

assign_signer_to_packet_slot.description: assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D
preconditions: I can only assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for case A and B has been created and C is the required person for A and C has their authorization documents verified and C's contact is verified and B has signature slot D

I can only assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B is assigned to signer C
effects: Once I assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D, it is the case that B is assigned to signer C
Once I assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a borrower signatory C a signature slot D, it is not the case anymore that B has signature slot D

start_signature_collection.description: start signature collection for a drawdown-packet A
preconditions: I can only start signature collection for a drawdown-packet A if it is the case that A has been created
I can only start signature collection for a drawdown-packet A if it is not the case that A is finalized and it is not the case that signature collection has started for A
effects: Once I start signature collection for a drawdown-packet A, it is the case that signature collection has started for A

capture_signer_signature.description: capture signer signature a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B
preconditions: I can only capture signer signature a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B if it is the case that signature collection has started for A and A is assigned to signer B
I can only capture signer signature a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B if it is not the case that B's signature is captured on A
effects: Once I capture signer signature a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B, it is the case that B's signature is captured on A

verify_two_distinct_signatures.description: verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C
preconditions: I can only verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C if it is the case that A is assigned to signer B and A is assigned to signer C and B's signature is captured on A and C's signature is captured on A

I can only verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C if it is not the case that the two signatures on A are verified and it is not the case that B is equal to C
effects: Once I verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C, it is the case that the two signatures on A are verified

perform_packet_compliance_check.description: perform packet compliance check on a drawdown-packet A whose two signatures are verified and which has not yet been checked for packet compliance
preconditions: I can only perform packet compliance check on a drawdown-packet A whose two signatures are verified and which has not yet been checked for packet compliance if it is the case that the two signatures on A are verified

I can only perform packet compliance check on a drawdown-packet A whose two signatures are verified and which has not yet been checked for packet compliance if it is not the case that A has been checked for packet compliance
effects: Once I perform packet compliance check on a drawdown-packet A whose two signatures are verified and which has not yet been checked for packet compliance, it is the case that A has been checked for packet compliance

finalize_drawdown_packet.description: finalize a drawdown-packet A after compliance check and stop signature collection for a drawdown-packet A
preconditions: I can only finalize a drawdown-packet A after compliance check and stop signature collection for a drawdown-packet A if it is the case that A has been checked for packet compliance
I can only finalize a drawdown-packet A after compliance check and stop signature collection for a drawdown-packet A if it is not the case that A is finalized
effects: Once I finalize a drawdown-packet A after compliance check and stop signature collection for a drawdown-packet A, it is the case that A is finalized
Once I finalize a drawdown-packet A after compliance check and stop signature collection for a drawdown-packet A, it is not the case anymore that signature collection has started for A

confirm_packet_has_three_facility_docs.description: confirm a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A attached to a facility document C, a facility document D and a facility document E is complete
preconditions: I can only confirm a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A attached to a facility document C, a facility document D and a facility document E is complete if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for case A and B is finalized and B is attached to the facility document C and B is attached to the facility document D and B is attached to the facility document E

I can only confirm a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A attached to a facility document C, a facility document D and a facility document E is complete if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that the drawdown packet for A is complete and it is not the case that C is equal to D and it is not the case that C is equal to E and it is not the case that D is equal to E
effects: Once I confirm a drawdown packet B for a drawdown case A attached to a facility document C, a facility document D and a facility document E is complete, it is the case that the drawdown packet for A is complete

reopen_packet_and_reset_signatures.description: reopen packet and reset signatures a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a reopen key token C a signature slot D a signature slot E
preconditions: I can only reopen packet and reset signatures a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a reopen key token C a signature slot D a signature slot E if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and B is a packet for case A and B has been created and C is available

I can only reopen packet and reset signatures a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a reopen key token C a signature slot D a signature slot E if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that B has been reopened
effects: Once I reopen packet and reset signatures a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a reopen key token C a signature slot D a signature slot E, it is the case that B has been reopened and C is consumed and B has signature slot D and B has signature slot E

Once I reopen packet and reset signatures a drawdown case A a drawdown packet B a reopen key token C a signature slot D a signature slot E, it is not the case anymore that C is available and it is not the case anymore that B is finalized and it is not the case anymore that B has been checked for packet compliance and it is not the case anymore that the two signatures on B are verified and it is not the case anymore that signature collection has started for B

lock_case_for_execution.description: lock a case A for execution with a packet B
preconditions: I can only lock a case A for execution with a packet B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and the drawdown packet for A is complete and B is a packet for case A and B is finalized and A is authorized for packet creation
I can only lock a case A for execution with a packet B if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown
effects: Once I lock a case A for execution with a packet B, it is the case that A is drawdown locked
Once I lock a case A for execution with a packet B, it is not the case anymore that the drawdown for A is open

reopen_locked_case.description: reopen a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B
preconditions: I can only reopen a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and B is available
I can only reopen a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B if it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown
effects: Once I reopen a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B, it is the case that the drawdown for A is open and A has a compliance hold flag and B is consumed
Once I reopen a drawdown case A with a reopen key token B, it is not the case anymore that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case anymore that B is available

freeze_case_due_to_suspicious_payment.description: freeze drawdown for a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B
preconditions: I can only freeze drawdown for a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B if it is the case that the drawdown for A is open

I can only freeze drawdown for a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B if it is not the case that A is drawdown locked and it is not the case that A is authorized for packet creation and it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown
effects: Once I freeze drawdown for a drawdown case A due to suspicious a payment instruction B, it is the case that A has the payment instruction B and A has a suspicious payment flag and A has a frozen drawdown

draft_payment_instruction.description: draft a payment instruction B for a case A
preconditions: I can only draft a payment instruction B for a case A if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and A is authorized for packet creation and the drawdown packet for A is complete
I can only draft a payment instruction B for a case A if it is not the case that a payment instruction has been drafted for A and it is not the case that A has the payment instruction B
effects: Once I draft a payment instruction B for a case A, it is the case that a payment instruction has been drafted for A and A has the payment instruction B and B payment instruction was created and A payment instruction has been validated

validate_payment_instruction.description: validate payment instruction for a case A
preconditions: I can only validate payment instruction for a case A if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and A payment instruction has been validated
I can only validate payment instruction for a case A if it is not the case that the payment instruction for A is approved
effects: Once I validate payment instruction for a case A, it is the case that the payment instruction for A is approved

approve_payment_instruction.description: approve payment instruction for a case A
preconditions: I can only approve payment instruction for a case A if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and the payment instruction for A is approved
I can only approve payment instruction for a case A if it is not the case that the payment instruction for A is ready to be signed
effects: Once I approve payment instruction for a case A, it is the case that the payment instruction for A is ready to be signed

sign_payment_instruction.description: sign a payment instruction A for a drawdown case B
preconditions: I can only sign a payment instruction A for a drawdown case B if it is the case that B is drawdown locked and A payment instruction was created and the payment instruction for B is ready to be signed
I can only sign a payment instruction A for a drawdown case B if it is not the case that A is a signed payment instruction
effects: Once I sign a payment instruction A for a drawdown case B, it is the case that A is a signed payment instruction

send_instruction_to_treasury.description: send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury
preconditions: I can only send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury if it is the case that A is a signed payment instruction
I can only send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury if it is not the case that A is sent to the treasury
effects: Once I send a signed payment instruction A to the treasury, it is the case that A is sent to the treasury

execute_treasury_release.description: execute treasury release for a payment instruction A on a drawdown case B using a drawdown packet C attached to a facility document D
preconditions: I can only execute treasury release for a payment instruction A on a drawdown case B using a drawdown packet C attached to a facility document D if it is the case that B is drawdown locked and B is authorized for packet creation and B is approved for risk and A is sent to the treasury and C is a packet for case B and C is finalized and C is attached to the facility document D and the facility D is eligible for the case B and D requires fx review and the covenant statement for B is verified and the use of proceeds for B has been verified

I can only execute treasury release for a payment instruction A on a drawdown case B using a drawdown packet C attached to a facility document D if it is not the case that A payment instruction has been executed
effects: Once I execute treasury release for a payment instruction A on a drawdown case B using a drawdown packet C attached to a facility document D, it is the case that A payment instruction has been executed

reserve_wire_cutoff_window.description: reserve a wire cutoff window token B for a payment instruction A
preconditions: I can only reserve a wire cutoff window token B for a payment instruction A if it is the case that A payment instruction has been executed and B is available
I can only reserve a wire cutoff window token B for a payment instruction A if it is not the case that wire cutoff is reserved for A
effects: Once I reserve a wire cutoff window token B for a payment instruction A, it is the case that wire cutoff is reserved for A and B is consumed
Once I reserve a wire cutoff window token B for a payment instruction A, it is not the case anymore that B is available

consume_cutoff_window_without_reservatio.description: consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A without reservation
preconditions: I can only consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A without reservation if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and B is available
I can only consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A without reservation if it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown
effects: Once I consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A without reservation, it is the case that B is consumed
Once I consume a wire cutoff window token B for a drawdown case A without reservation, it is not the case anymore that B is available

release_wire_payment.description: release a payment instruction A by wire
preconditions: I can only release a payment instruction A by wire if it is the case that wire cutoff is reserved for A
I can only release a payment instruction A by wire if it is not the case that the beneficiary of A is credited and it is not the case that A has been released by wire
effects: Once I release a payment instruction A by wire, it is the case that A has been released by wire

confirm_beneficiary_credit.description: confirm that beneficiary of a payment_instruction A is credited
preconditions: I can only confirm that beneficiary of a payment_instruction A is credited if it is the case that A has been released by wire
I can only confirm that beneficiary of a payment_instruction A is credited if it is not the case that the beneficiary of A is credited
effects: Once I confirm that beneficiary of a payment_instruction A is credited, it is the case that the beneficiary of A is credited

mark_funds_settled.description: mark funds for a payment instruction A as settled
preconditions: I can only mark funds for a payment instruction A as settled if it is the case that the beneficiary of A is credited
I can only mark funds for a payment instruction A as settled if it is not the case that funds for A are settled
effects: Once I mark funds for a payment instruction A as settled, it is the case that funds for A are settled

create_disbursement_notice.description: create disbursement notice a drawdown case A a disbursement notice B a borrower signatory C a notice dispatch window token D a drawdown packet E a facility document F
preconditions: I can only create disbursement notice a drawdown case A a disbursement notice B a borrower signatory C a notice dispatch window token D a drawdown packet E a facility document F if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and D is available and E is a packet for case A and E is finalized and E is attached to the facility document F and the facility F is eligible for the case A and the facility requires agent notice for F and C is the required person for A and C has full clearance

I can only create disbursement notice a drawdown case A a disbursement notice B a borrower signatory C a notice dispatch window token D a drawdown packet E a facility document F if it is not the case that B is addressed to the signer C in case A
effects: Once I create disbursement notice a drawdown case A a disbursement notice B a borrower signatory C a notice dispatch window token D a drawdown packet E a facility document F, it is the case that B is addressed to the signer C in case A and B has been created and D is consumed

Once I create disbursement notice a drawdown case A a disbursement notice B a borrower signatory C a notice dispatch window token D a drawdown packet E a facility document F, it is not the case anymore that D is available

preconditions: I can only approve a disbursement notice A if it is the case that A has been created
I can only approve a disbursement notice A if it is not the case that A is approved
effects: Once I approve a disbursement notice A, it is the case that A is approved

create_notice_delivery_package.description: create a delivery_package A for a disbursement_notice B
preconditions: I can only create a delivery_package A for a disbursement_notice B if it is the case that B has been created and B is approved
I can only create a delivery_package A for a disbursement_notice B if it is not the case that the delivery package A has been created
effects: Once I create a delivery_package A for a disbursement_notice B, it is the case that the delivery package A has been created and the package A is for the notice B

apply_delivery_label.description: apply delivery label to a delivery_package A using a delivery_slot_token B
preconditions: I can only apply delivery label to a delivery_package A using a delivery_slot_token B if it is the case that the delivery package A has been created and B is available
I can only apply delivery label to a delivery_package A using a delivery_slot_token B if it is not the case that A is a labeled package
effects: Once I apply delivery label to a delivery_package A using a delivery_slot_token B, it is the case that A is a labeled package and B is consumed
Once I apply delivery label to a delivery_package A using a delivery_slot_token B, it is not the case anymore that B is available

assign_senior_override_review.description: assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B
preconditions: I can only assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and B is available
I can only assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B if it is not the case that A is assigned a senior override
effects: Once I assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B, it is the case that A is assigned a senior override and B is consumed
Once I assign senior override review to a drawdown case A using a delivery slot token B, it is not the case anymore that B is available

print_delivery_label.description: print delivery label for a delivery package A
preconditions: I can only print delivery label for a delivery package A if it is the case that A is a labeled package
I can only print delivery label for a delivery package A if it is not the case that A has a printed label
effects: Once I print delivery label for a delivery package A, it is the case that A has a printed label

scan_delivery_label.description: scan printed label of a delivery package A
preconditions: I can only scan printed label of a delivery package A if it is the case that A has a printed label
I can only scan printed label of a delivery package A if it is not the case that the label of A has been scanned
effects: Once I scan printed label of a delivery package A, it is the case that the label of A has been scanned

mark_notice_ready.description: mark a disbursement-notice A as ready to be sent
preconditions: I can only mark a disbursement-notice A as ready to be sent if it is the case that A is ready to be sent
effects: Once I mark a disbursement-notice A as ready to be sent, it is the case that A is ready to be sent

send_notice_via_secure_delivery.description: send a disbursement notice A using a payment instruction B for a drawdown case C in a delivery package D to a borrower signatory E via secure delivery
preconditions: I can only send a disbursement notice A using a payment instruction B for a drawdown case C in a delivery package D to a borrower signatory E via secure delivery if it is the case that C is drawdown locked and A is addressed to the signer E in case C and A has been created and C has the payment instruction B and B payment instruction was created and the package D is for the notice A and the label of D has been scanned and A is ready to be sent

I can only send a disbursement notice A using a payment instruction B for a drawdown case C in a delivery package D to a borrower signatory E via secure delivery if it is not the case that C has a frozen drawdown and it is not the case that A has been sent
effects: Once I send a disbursement notice A using a payment instruction B for a drawdown case C in a delivery package D to a borrower signatory E via secure delivery, it is the case that A has been sent

complete_final_controls.description: complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G
preconditions: I can only complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and A is authorized for packet creation and A is approved for risk and the drawdown package for A is compiled and a two-officer signoff is recorded for A and B is the required person for A and C is the required person for A and D is the required person for A and E is the required person for A and B has full clearance and C has full clearance and D has full clearance and E has full clearance and funds for F are settled and G has been sent

I can only complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G if it is not the case that B is equal to C and it is not the case that D is equal to E and it is not the case that A has a compliance hold flag and it is not the case that A has a suspicious payment flag and it is not the case that A has a frozen drawdown and it is not the case that final controls are complete for A
effects: Once I complete final controls a drawdown case A a borrower signatory B a borrower signatory C a bank drawdown officer D a bank drawdown officer E a payment instruction F a disbursement notice G, it is the case that final controls are complete for A

close_drawdown_case.description: close drawdown case a drawdown-case A using a payment-instruction B and a disbursement-notice C
preconditions: I can only close drawdown case a drawdown-case A using a payment-instruction B and a disbursement-notice C if it is the case that A is drawdown locked and final controls are complete for A and B payment instruction was created and B payment instruction has been executed and the beneficiary of B is credited and C has been sent
I can only close drawdown case a drawdown-case A using a payment-instruction B and a disbursement-notice C if it is not the case that the drawdown for A is completed
effects: Once I close drawdown case a drawdown-case A using a payment-instruction B and a disbursement-notice C, it is the case that the drawdown for A is completed
Once I close drawdown case a drawdown-case A using a payment-instruction B and a disbursement-notice C, it is not the case anymore that A is drawdown locked

action_nl_templates.select_request_channel: select request channel {?channel} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.select_facility_document: select facility document {?facility_doc} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.verify_borrowing_base_certificate: verify borrowing base certificate for drawdown-case {?case} using document {?borrowing_base_doc}
action_nl_templates.verify_compliance_certificate: verify compliance certificate compliance certificate {?compliance_cert_doc} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.verify_covenant_compliance_statement: verify covenant compliance statement covenant_compliance_statement {?covenant_statement_doc} for drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates.verify_use_of_proceeds_statement: verify use of proceeds statement document {?use_of_proceeds_doc} for drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates.verify_person_authorization_record: verify authorization_kyc_record {?auth_kyc_doc} for participant_person {?person} in drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates.verify_person_contact_details: verify person contact details for participant person {?person} in drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.run_full_person_screening: run full person screening for participant person {?person} on drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.run_pep_screening_only: run pep screening only for participant person {?person} on drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.complete_basic_drawdown_checks: complete basic drawdown checks for case {?case}
action_nl_templates.approve_drawdown_package_fast_track: approve fast-track drawdown package for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.raise_compliance_hold: raise compliance hold on drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.create_drawdown_packet: create drawdown packet drawdown_packet {?packet} for drawdown_case {?case} with signature slots signature_slot {?signature_slot_1} and signature_slot {?signature_slot_2}
action_nl_templates.attach_facility_document_to_packet: attach facility document facility_document {?facility_doc} to packet drawdown_packet {?packet} for case drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates.perform_packet_compliance_check: perform packet compliance check on drawdown-packet {?packet} whose two signatures are verified and which has not yet been checked for packet compliance
action_nl_templates.finalize_drawdown_packet: finalize drawdown-packet {?packet} after compliance check and stop signature collection for drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates.confirm_packet_has_three_facility_docs: confirm drawdown packet {?packet} for drawdown case {?case} attached to facility document {?facility_doc_1}, facility document {?facility_doc_2} and facility document {?facility_doc_3} is complete
action_nl_templates.lock_case_for_execution: lock case {?case} for execution with packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates.reopen_locked_case: reopen drawdown case {?case} with reopen key token {?reopen_token}
action_nl_templates.freeze_case_due_to_suspicious_payment: freeze drawdown for drawdown case {?case} due to suspicious payment instruction {?payment_instruction}
action_nl_templates.sign_payment_instruction: sign payment instruction {?payment_instruction} for drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates.send_instruction_to_treasury: send signed payment instruction {?payment_instruction} to the treasury
action_nl_templates.execute_treasury_release: execute treasury release for payment instruction {?payment_instruction} on drawdown case {?case} using drawdown packet {?packet} attached to facility document {?facility_doc}
action_nl_templates.reserve_wire_cutoff_window: reserve wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token} for payment instruction {?payment_instruction}
action_nl_templates.consume_cutoff_window_without_reservatio: consume wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token} for drawdown case {?case} without reservation
action_nl_templates.confirm_beneficiary_credit: confirm that beneficiary of payment_instruction {?payment_instruction} is credited
action_nl_templates.mark_funds_settled: mark funds for payment instruction {?payment_instruction} as settled
action_nl_templates.apply_delivery_label: apply delivery label to delivery_package {?delivery_package} using delivery_slot_token {?delivery_slot_token}
action_nl_templates.assign_senior_override_review: assign senior override review to drawdown case {?case} using delivery slot token {?delivery_slot_token}
action_nl_templates.print_delivery_label: print delivery label for delivery package {?delivery_package}
action_nl_templates.scan_delivery_label: scan printed label of delivery package {?delivery_package}
action_nl_templates.mark_notice_ready: mark disbursement-notice {?notice} as ready to be sent
action_nl_templates.send_notice_via_secure_delivery: send disbursement notice {?notice} using payment instruction {?payment_instruction} for drawdown case {?case} in delivery package {?delivery_package} to borrower signatory {?borrower_signer} via secure delivery
action_nl_templates.close_drawdown_case: close drawdown case drawdown-case {?case} using payment-instruction {?payment_instruction} and disbursement-notice {?notice}

predicate_nl_templates.facility_requires_agent_notice: the facility requires agent notice for {?facility_doc}
predicate_nl_templates.facility_selected: the facility {?facility_doc} is selected for case {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.doc_is_compliance_certificate: the document {?doc} is a compliance certificate
predicate_nl_templates.doc_is_use_of_proceeds_statement: {?doc} is a use of proceeds statement
predicate_nl_templates.covenant_statement_verified: the covenant statement for {?case} is verified
predicate_nl_templates.use_of_proceeds_verified: the use of proceeds for {?case} has been verified
predicate_nl_templates.two_officer_signoff_recorded: a two-officer signoff is recorded for {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.basic_drawdown_checks_complete: basic drawdown checks are complete for {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.drawdown_package_compiled: the drawdown package for {?case} is compiled
predicate_nl_templates.facility_eligible_for_case: the facility {?facility_doc} is eligible for the case {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.packet_attached_facility_document: {?packet} is attached to the facility document {?facility_doc}
predicate_nl_templates.two_signatures_verified: the two signatures on {?packet} are verified
predicate_nl_templates.packet_compliance_checked: {?packet} has been checked for packet compliance
predicate_nl_templates.drawdown_packet_complete: the drawdown packet for {?case} is complete
predicate_nl_templates.payment_instruction_drafted: a payment instruction has been drafted for {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.payment_instruction_approved: the payment instruction for {?case} is approved
predicate_nl_templates.payment_instruction_ready_to_sign: the payment instruction for {?case} is ready to be signed
predicate_nl_templates.notice_addressed_to_signer: {?notice} is addressed to the signer {?borrower_signer} in case {?case}
predicate_nl_templates.delivery_package_created: the delivery package {?delivery_package} has been created
predicate_nl_templates.package_for_notice: the package {?delivery_package} is for the notice {?notice}
predicate_nl_templates.label_scanned: the label of {?delivery_package} has been scanned

action_nl_templates_indef.open_drawdown_case: open drawdown case a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.select_request_channel: select a request channel {?channel} for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.select_facility_document: select a facility document {?facility_doc} for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_borrowing_base_certificate: verify borrowing base certificate for a drawdown-case {?case} using a document {?borrowing_base_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_compliance_certificate: verify compliance certificate a compliance certificate {?compliance_cert_doc} for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_covenant_compliance_statement: verify covenant compliance statement a covenant_compliance_statement {?covenant_statement_doc} for a drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_use_of_proceeds_statement: verify use of proceeds statement a document {?use_of_proceeds_doc} for a drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_fee_calculation_sheet: verify fee calculation sheet a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown document {?fee_calc_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.record_two_officer_signoff: record two officer signoff a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown document {?fee_calc_doc} a bank drawdown officer {?officer_1} a bank drawdown officer {?officer_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_person_authorization_record: verify an authorization_kyc_record {?auth_kyc_doc} for a participant_person {?person} in a drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_person_contact_details: verify person contact details for a participant person {?person} in a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.run_full_person_screening: run full person screening for a participant person {?person} on a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.run_sanctions_screening_only: run sanctions screening only a drawdown case {?case} a participant person {?person}
action_nl_templates_indef.run_pep_screening_only: run pep screening only for a participant person {?person} on a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.complete_basic_drawdown_checks: complete basic drawdown checks for a case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.enable_fast_track: enable fast track for a drawdown-case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.compile_drawdown_package: compile drawdown package a drawdown case {?case} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_1} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_2} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_1} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_2} a drawdown document {?borrowing_base_doc} a drawdown document {?covenant_statement_doc} a drawdown document {?compliance_cert_doc} a drawdown document {?use_of_proceeds_doc} a drawdown document {?fee_calc_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.approve_drawdown_package_four_eyes: approve drawdown package four eyes a drawdown case {?case} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_1} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_2} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_1} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.approve_drawdown_package_fast_track: approve fast-track drawdown package for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.authorize_packet_creation: authorize packet creation for a drawdown-case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.raise_compliance_hold: raise compliance hold on a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.validate_facility_document: validate a facility document {?facility_doc} for a case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.create_drawdown_packet: create drawdown packet a drawdown_packet {?packet} for a drawdown_case {?case} with signature slots a signature_slot {?signature_slot_1} and a signature_slot {?signature_slot_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.attach_facility_document_to_packet: attach facility document a facility_document {?facility_doc} to packet a drawdown_packet {?packet} for case a drawdown_case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.assign_signer_to_packet_slot: assign signer to packet slot a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown packet {?packet} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer} a signature slot {?signature_slot}
action_nl_templates_indef.start_signature_collection: start signature collection for a drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates_indef.capture_signer_signature: capture signer signature a drawdown packet {?packet} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer}
action_nl_templates_indef.verify_two_distinct_signatures: verify two distinct signatures a drawdown packet {?packet} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_1} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.perform_packet_compliance_check: perform packet compliance check on a drawdown-packet {?packet} whose two signatures are verified and which has not yet been checked for packet compliance
action_nl_templates_indef.finalize_drawdown_packet: finalize a drawdown-packet {?packet} after compliance check and stop signature collection for a drawdown-packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates_indef.confirm_packet_has_three_facility_docs: confirm a drawdown packet {?packet} for a drawdown case {?case} attached to a facility document {?facility_doc_1}, a facility document {?facility_doc_2} and a facility document {?facility_doc_3} is complete
action_nl_templates_indef.reopen_packet_and_reset_signatures: reopen packet and reset signatures a drawdown case {?case} a drawdown packet {?packet} a reopen key token {?reopen_token} a signature slot {?signature_slot_1} a signature slot {?signature_slot_2}
action_nl_templates_indef.lock_case_for_execution: lock a case {?case} for execution with a packet {?packet}
action_nl_templates_indef.reopen_locked_case: reopen a drawdown case {?case} with a reopen key token {?reopen_token}
action_nl_templates_indef.freeze_case_due_to_suspicious_payment: freeze drawdown for a drawdown case {?case} due to suspicious a payment instruction {?payment_instruction}
action_nl_templates_indef.draft_payment_instruction: draft a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} for a case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.validate_payment_instruction: validate payment instruction for a case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.approve_payment_instruction: approve payment instruction for a case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.sign_payment_instruction: sign a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} for a drawdown case {?case}
action_nl_templates_indef.send_instruction_to_treasury: send a signed payment instruction {?payment_instruction} to the treasury
action_nl_templates_indef.execute_treasury_release: execute treasury release for a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} on a drawdown case {?case} using a drawdown packet {?packet} attached to a facility document {?facility_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.reserve_wire_cutoff_window: reserve a wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token} for a payment instruction {?payment_instruction}
action_nl_templates_indef.consume_cutoff_window_without_reservatio: consume a wire cutoff window token {?cutoff_window_token} for a drawdown case {?case} without reservation
action_nl_templates_indef.release_wire_payment: release a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} by wire
action_nl_templates_indef.confirm_beneficiary_credit: confirm that beneficiary of a payment_instruction {?payment_instruction} is credited
action_nl_templates_indef.mark_funds_settled: mark funds for a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} as settled
action_nl_templates_indef.create_disbursement_notice: create disbursement notice a drawdown case {?case} a disbursement notice {?notice} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer} a notice dispatch window token {?dispatch_window_token} a drawdown packet {?packet} a facility document {?facility_doc}
action_nl_templates_indef.create_notice_delivery_package: create a delivery_package {?delivery_package} for a disbursement_notice {?notice}
action_nl_templates_indef.apply_delivery_label: apply delivery label to a delivery_package {?delivery_package} using a delivery_slot_token {?delivery_slot_token}
action_nl_templates_indef.assign_senior_override_review: assign senior override review to a drawdown case {?case} using a delivery slot token {?delivery_slot_token}
action_nl_templates_indef.print_delivery_label: print delivery label for a delivery package {?delivery_package}
action_nl_templates_indef.scan_delivery_label: scan printed label of a delivery package {?delivery_package}
action_nl_templates_indef.mark_notice_ready: mark a disbursement-notice {?notice} as ready to be sent
action_nl_templates_indef.send_notice_via_secure_delivery: send a disbursement notice {?notice} using a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} for a drawdown case {?case} in a delivery package {?delivery_package} to a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer} via secure delivery
action_nl_templates_indef.complete_final_controls: complete final controls a drawdown case {?case} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_1} a borrower signatory {?borrower_signer_2} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_1} a bank drawdown officer {?bank_officer_2} a payment instruction {?payment_instruction} a disbursement notice {?notice}
action_nl_templates_indef.close_drawdown_case: close drawdown case a drawdown-case {?case} using a payment-instruction {?payment_instruction} and a disbursement-notice {?notice}

type_hierarchy: Everything that is a entity is also a object

Everything that is a drawdown case or a participant person or a drawdown document or a facility document or a drawdown packet or a payment instruction or a disbursement notice or a delivery package or a request channel or a signature slot or a resource token is also a entity
Everything that is a corporate drawdown case is also a drawdown case
Everything that is a borrower signatory or a bank drawdown officer is also a participant person
Everything that is a delivery slot token or a reopen key token or a wire cutoff window token or a notice dispatch window token is also a resource token
